Welcome to DBverdict â€” a tool to compare and migrate data between relational databases like MySQL and PostgreSQL, with cost and performance insights.

ðŸ“Œ AboutÂ¶

DBverdict simplifies cloud migration decisions by running benchmarks across different databases, presenting metrics like latency, throughput, and cost-efficiency. It supports AWS RDS provisioning, schema extraction, and performance profiling.
